detail_desc: Metal earrings with a plastic pendant. Length 2.5 cm.

5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with worn details. Relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs that finish just below the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with a concealed drawstring at the front and covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and button, and slim legs that finish just above the knees.

Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a print motif on one leg and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Straight-cut blouse in patterned mesh with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short, flounce-trimmed puff sleeves and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a woven Tencel™ lyocell blend with a deep V-neck and concealed zip at the back. Narrow cut with open sides, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Playsuit in sequined, glittery jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps. V-neck at the front, straight cut at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend containing some wool with a roll-edge neckline and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Ribbed hem with slits in the sides.

Short dress in satin with a sheen. Draped neckline at the front, elastic spaghetti shoulder straps and a drawstring down the sides for a draped effect. Unlined.
Short, fitted jacket dress in sequined jersey with peak lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed fastening. Unlined.

Rain coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined. The coat can be folded and packed easily into its storage bag which has an elasticated drawstring at the top. Size of bag 9x21 cm. The coat has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
